prompts: Create a grass-type Pokemon with a vibrant green body and a cheerful expression.
I want a cute poison-type Pokemon that has large ears and a round body.
Generate a unique Pokemon that combines elements of both flowers and mushrooms in its design.
Make a small, bipedal Pokemon that resembles a walking plant with distinct colors.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and has a playful personality.
Design a Pokemon that can camouflage in forest habitats and has a shy demeanor.
Show me a Pokemon that has both grass and poison typing, with colorful petals as features.
